name: Simple Stromboli from HORMEL®123
author: HORMEL NATURAL CHOICE
summary: This rolled sandwich on pizza dough is filled with salami, ham, sauce, mozzarella cheese, and bell pepper then baked and sliced.
ingredients: 1 (13 ounce) can refrigerated pizza crust dough
1 (7 ounce) package HORMEL® NATURAL CHOICE® Uncured Hard Salami
1 (9 ounce) package HORMEL® NATURAL CHOICE® Smoked Deli Ham, cut into strips
¼ cup chopped green bell pepper
directions: Spray baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray
Unroll dough; place on sprayed baking sheet
Starting at center, press out dough with hands to form a 12x8-inch rectangle
Spread sauce over dough within 1 to 2 inches of the edge
Evenly distribute salami and ham lengthwise down center, within 1/2 inch of short sides
Top with cheese, bell pepper, onion and Italian seasoning
Fold long sides of dough over filling; press edges to seal
Spread beaten egg wash on top of sealed dough and sprinkle with 1 tablespoon of grated Parmesan cheese
Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until crust is golden brown
